description.value:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You successfully use Stealth to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Hide]{Hide} and become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Hidden]{Hidden} from all of your current foes, or use Stealth to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Sneak]{Sneak} and become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Undetected]{Undetected} to all your current foes.

When you put your mind to slipping out of sight, you disappear completely.

You become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Invisible]{Invisible} for 1 minute, even if you use a hostile action. Not even @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Glitterdust]{Glitterdust}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.See Invisibility]{See Invisibility}, or similar effects can reveal you, though creatures can still use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Seek]{Seek} action to locate you as normal.
